Package org.forgerock.openidm.repo.orientdb.impl.query

Class ConfiguredQueries<Q extends com.orientechnologies.orient.core.command.OCommandRequest,R extends org.forgerock.json.resource.Request,U>

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.repo.orientdb.impl.query.ConfiguredQueries<Q,R,U>
Type Parameters:
Q - The query object type
R - The request type
U - The result type
Direct Known Subclasses:
Commands, Queries
public abstract class ConfiguredQueries<Q extends com.orientechnologies.orient.core.command.OCommandRequest,R extends org.forgerock.json.resource.Request,U> extends Object
Configured and ad-hoc query support on OrientDB Queries can contain tokens of the format ${token-name}

    setConfiguredQueries(Map<String,String> queries)
    Set the pre-configured queries, which are identified by a query identifier and can be invoked using this identifier Success to set the queries does not mean they are valid as some can only be validated at query execution time.

  • Method Details

    • setConfiguredQueries

      public void setConfiguredQueries(Map<String,String> queries)
      Set the pre-configured queries, which are identified by a query identifier and can be invoked using this identifier Success to set the queries does not mean they are valid as some can only be validated at query execution time.
      Parameters:
      queries - the complete list of configured queries, mapping from query id to the query expression which may optionally contain tokens in the form ${token-name}.

    • queryIdExists

      public boolean queryIdExists(String queryId)
      Check if a queryId is present in the set of configured queries.
      Parameters:
      queryId - Id of the query to check for
      Returns:
      true if the queryId is present in the set of configured queries.

    • createQueryObject

      protected abstract Q createQueryObject(String queryString)
      Create the prepared query object type according to the implementation.
      Parameters:
      queryString - the query expression, including tokens to replace
      Returns:
      the prepared query object

    • query

      public abstract U query(String type, R request, com.orientechnologies.orient.core.db.document.ODatabaseDocumentTx database) throws org.forgerock.json.resource.BadRequestException
      Execute a query, either a pre-configured query by using the query ID, or a query expression passed as part of the params. The keys for the input parameters as well as the return map entries are in QueryConstants.
      Parameters:
      type - the relative/local resource name, which needs to be converted to match the OrientDB document class name
      request - the query request, including parameters which include the query id, or the query expression, as well as the token key/value pairs to replace in the query
      database - a handle to a database connection instance for exclusive use by the query method whilst it is executing.
      Returns:
      The query result, which includes meta-data about the query, and the result set itself.
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.resource.BadRequestException - if the passed request parameters are invalid, e.g. missing query id or query expression or tokens.
